	* Released PlugBoard 0.2
	* Added DictContextResource test
	* Added ez_setup to skeleton

	* Removed zope.interface dependency

24-Feb-2006
	* Print traceback when importing plugin fails

21-Feb-2006
	* Fixed importing plugins using setuptools

17-Feb-2006
	* Fixed zope.interface dependency
	* Added a new example

13-Feb-2006
	* Fixed adaption registering issue

12-Feb-2006
	* Added plugboard.berlios.de website docs

	* Added new DictContextResource
	* Changed SharedEventArgument initialization behavior
	* Added a simple example
	* Various fixes

	* Released PlugBoard 0.1.1
	* Added a basic documentation
	* Added an unstable WX engine with tests

	* Released PlugBoard 0.1
